channel.title: FS EU : Axoloti
channel.description:
I've got quite a few axoloti board (5 iirc) ... and Im honestly not using them all these days. so given the lack of availability I could sell a couple to someone who **needs** them !
not really thought about which to sell (Im obviously not selling them all !)
all have some kind of case (I think :) ) one has the Music Thing controller (axo control) , you'll find on forum pictures another has hohum enclosure (which has screen/pots), see [this post](http://community.axoloti.com/t/hohum-contributions/5409/27?u=thetechnobear)
unfortunately, EU only, not sure about prices, something like... (excl shipping) axoloti + basic case - 80 euro axoloti + axo control - 100 euro axoloti + hohum - 160 euro (bargain ... the case was 120 euro! )
anyway DM me about what you are interested in and we'll see what we can do (sorry, EU only, I don't want to get into shipping/customs hassles !)
no promises, as Ive not really thought this thru ... I just happened to pop by the forum, and felt guilty people were not able to get their hands on axoloti, and Ive a few sitting in my cupboard ;)

item.title: FS EU : Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

sorry, all spares I had have all now been allocated on first come basis.
(if for some reason these fall thru, I'll PM 'backups' based on order of msg/posts.... but I doubt this'll happen)

the remaining I have, Im keeping

Read full topic

item.title: FS EU : Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @mDang maxime
item.description:
@mDang wrote:

Hello,

As I said in a topic, I'm looking for axoloti to build a synth with young kidz and give them the synth at the end.

So I'm in for your axoloti + axo control
Best

Maxime

Read full topic

item.title: FS EU : Axoloti
item.dc:creator: @Paulus
item.description:
@Paulus wrote:

Hi @thetechnobear!

I would be really interested in buying your axoloti + basic case.

I'm sending you a PM now.

Read full topic
